e: ￹`misa~`fangcal~ `to~ `faloco'~￺to make changes in attitude￻清心，改變態度(往好的方面)，修身養性
￹`misa~`fangcal~ `to~ `demak~￺to do work very well￻把事情做好
￹`misa~`fangcal~ `to~ `loma'~￺to fix up the home very nice￻整修房屋
￹`O~ `ni~`safangcalan~ `no~ `Kawas~ `kita~.￺God cleansed * purified us.￻上帝潔淨我們
￹`Ma~`palafangcal~ `nira~ `kako~.￺He made me good.￻他把我當作好人
d.f: ￹￺biblical usage - holy￻在聖經上指神聖，聖潔等
